thread.section_title: Disc Makers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Disc Makers | discmakers.com | 5 of 33
thread.title: Greg Coleman
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Greg Coleman

author: Greg Coleman
title: Greg Coleman
text:
This is the second time that I used this company to produce my CD's and both times they did an excellent job, (with what I gave them to work with).
And I say that because I don't have access to a Million Dollar LA Studio with all the perks that this brings.
On my latest project, they really did an excellent job with Post Production, giving my project greater presence and more punch.
I was totally please with work that they did in Post Production, since this was the first time that I have ever enlisted them to do that. The coordination with Artwork, and Production of the Product was excellent as well.
I highly recommend Disk Makers to Independent Musicians and Record Labels that do not have access to Million Dollar Facilities and Budgets that match.
Great Job Disk Makers..
